title: Invoke Private REST API gateway custom domain from Amazon EventBridge schedule
description: The SAM template deploys a Amazon EventBridge schedule that invokes a Private REST API gateway custom domain.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: Amazon EventBridge schedule is created using the SAM template which will Invoke the Eventbridge API destinations every 5 minutes.
Amazon EventBridge API destinations will invoke the Private REST API gateway custom domain using the EventBridge connection.
Amazon EventBridge connection is configured with the Amazon VPC Lattice and AWS PrivateLink to connect to Private API within AWS network.
